Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh has made a bold move by axing seasoned batter Litton Das from the playing XI for the final ODI, following his failure to score any runs in the series so far.
Dilshan Madushanka’s absence due to injury opens the door for Thekshana to make an appearance in the playing XI.
Our prediction favors Sri Lanka to win.
Sri Lanka tour of Bangladesh finished on 18th March 2024 with 3rd ODI.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be hosted at the Zahur Ahmed Chowdhury Stadium, Chattogram.
The match is scheduled for 18th March 2024 at 09:30 IST.
The pitch is expected to be even and offer minimal assistance to the bowlers.
The temperature is 28.7°C, sky is mostly cloudy, humidity is 78%, and there is a 1% chance of rain.
Fast bowlers have performed better than spinners on this venue in the last 10 matches.
Pathum Nissanka, Charith Asalanka, and Kusal Mendis are the top batters at this venue.
Wanindu Hasaranga, Shoriful Islam, and Taskin Ahmed are the top bowlers at this venue.
Wanindu Hasaranga and Pathum Nissanka are must-have players in your fantasy team.
